text: The Masked Singer is a famous reality TV show which started on January 2, 2019. The show is hosted by Nick Cannon, a famous American TV host, and Actor. The show is related to Masked Singer, a TV show which features celebrities singing songs. This show has panelists who identify celebrities through clues given in each season. These are the awards won by this show, * Outstanding Lighting Design/Lighting Direction For A Variety Series - 2021. * 2021 Winner HCA Award. Best Broadcast Network Reality Series, Competition Series, or Game Show * 2022 Nominee HCA Award. Best Broadcast Network Reality Show or Competition Series. Category:2010s American reality television series Category:2019 American television series debuts
title: The Masked Singer (American TV series)
